system.description:
Grants the power to control the actions of animals.

  • Affects: [[/r 1d6]] normal animals or 1 giant animal (not magical or intelligent animals).

  • Resisting: No saving throw is allowed.

  • Visual range: The character can only control animals that they can see.

  • Concentration: Control is broken if the user of the ring moves or attacks.

  • When concentration ends: The referee should make a reaction roll with a –1 penalty (see @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.tables.RollTable.vlY1VbzE4DjwyTeq]{Monster Reaction Roll}) to determine the animals’ behaviour.

  • Usage frequency: May be used up to once per turn.
